seo.title: HIPAA Compliance Built-In | Senova Medical Data Security
seo.description: Full HIPAA compliance with BAA included. 256-bit encryption, audit logs, access controls. Protecting patient data for 500+ practices.

hero.headline: 100% HIPAA Compliant from Day One
hero.subheadline: Enterprise-level security and compliance built into every aspect of Senova. BAA included with every plan at no extra cost.

sections.headline: Complete HIPAA Compliance Solution
sections.content: Senova is designed from the ground up to meet and exceed HIPAA requirements for protecting patient health information (PHI). We serve as a Business Associate to covered entities and maintain comprehensive safeguards to ensure the confidentiality, integrity, and availability of all PHI.
key_points: Business Associate Agreement (BAA) included with all plans
No additional fees for HIPAA compliance features
Comprehensive staff training on HIPAA requirements

sections.headline: Technical Safeguards
sections.description: Advanced technical controls protect PHI at every level

implementation: Unique user identification for every account
Automatic logoff after 15 minutes of inactivity
Comprehensive audit logs of all PHI access
Electronic mechanisms to verify PHI integrity
256-bit SSL/TLS encryption for all data in transit

sections.headline: Physical Safeguards
sections.description: Data center and facility security measures

measures: Inventory of all devices accessing PHI

sections.headline: Administrative Safeguards
sections.description: Policies and procedures to ensure HIPAA compliance

items: HIPAA training for all employees upon hire
Immediate termination of access upon departure

sections.headline: Business Associate Agreement (BAA)
sections.content: Every Senova customer receives a signed Business Associate Agreement at no additional cost. Our BAA covers:
coverage: Clear definition of PHI handling responsibilities
Commitment to implement all required safeguards
Return or destruction of PHI upon termination

sections.headline: Breach Response Protocol
sections.description: In the unlikely event of a security incident:

steps.action: Detailed incident report and remediation plan
Support for affected parties and prevention improvements

features.description: Every access, modification, and transmission of PHI is logged automatically
256-bit AES encryption at rest and in transit for all PHI
Granular role-based permissions with principle of least privilege
Automated encrypted backups with point-in-time recovery
Track and manage patient consent for data use and marketing
Configurable retention policies with automatic purging

certifications.description: Annual audit of security controls and processes
Quarterly security testing by ethical hackers

sections.headline: Shared Responsibility Model
sections.description: While we handle the technical compliance, customers must:

questions.question: Is the BAA really included at no extra cost?
questions.answer: Yes! Every Senova plan includes a signed BAA at no additional charge. We believe HIPAA compliance shouldn't be a premium feature.

questions.question: How quickly can I get a signed BAA?
questions.answer: We typically provide signed BAAs within 24 hours of request. For new customers, it's included in your onboarding package.

questions.question: Do you support HIPAA audits?
questions.answer: Absolutely. We provide all necessary documentation and support for HIPAA audits, including audit logs and compliance reports.

questions.question: What about subcontractors?
questions.answer: All our subcontractors who may access PHI are required to sign BAAs and maintain HIPAA compliance.

questions.question: How do you handle state-specific requirements?
questions.answer: Our compliance framework meets or exceeds all state requirements. We stay updated on evolving regulations.
